## makeIntegrationResponsesAllowCors() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Makes given [IntegrationResponse](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cdk/api/v2/docs/aws-cdk-lib.aws_apigateway.IntegrationResponse.html)<!-- -->s allow CORS.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function makeIntegrationResponsesAllowCors<T extends apigateway.IntegrationResponse>(responses: T[]): T[];
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

responses


</td><td>

T\[\]


</td><td>

Integration response settings to allow CORS.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

T\[\]

`responses` with updated [responseParameters](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cdk/api/v2/docs/aws-cdk-lib.aws_apigateway.IntegrationResponse.html#responseparameters)<!-- -->.

## Remarks

This function accepts any subclass `T` of [aws\_apigateway.IntegrationResponse](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cdk/api/v2/docs/aws-cdk-lib.aws_apigateway.IntegrationResponse.html)<!-- -->.

Configures the following response headers,

- `Access-Control-Allow-Origin`<!-- -->: `*`

- `Access-Control-Allow-Headers`<!-- -->: headers equivalent to [aws\_apigateway.Cors.DEFAULT\_HEADERS](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cdk/api/v2/docs/aws-cdk-lib.aws_apigateway.Cors.html#static-default_headers)

- `Access-Control-Allow-Methods`<!-- -->: methods equivalent to [aws\_apigateway.Cors.ALL\_METHODS](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cdk/api/v2/docs/aws-cdk-lib.aws_apigateway.Cors.html#static-all_methods)
